title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Wednesday 4 October 2017 - BBC News

nurse struck off after overdose blunder .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's the end of our live coverage for today .
updates on breaking news will continue to appear throughout the night .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the east midlands .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : heavy rain and gusty wind expected
text: it 's going to be wet and windy for much of the night with gusts of up 60mph possible .
the rain should clear south by dawn with clearer but chillier weather and lows of 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: your photos : why the long face ?
text: with a yellow weather warning in place ahead of this evening 's incoming wind and rain , you can understand why this horse in east bridgford may not look too happy .
thanks to emmyloo for the

elsewhere , our weather watchers have been out and about despite the looming clouds , with anne snapping these birds in flight above brailsford and scrappy snapping this playful feline chasing leaves in kegworth .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: rush hours delays expected on a50 after tractor crash
text: this relates to a crash early this morning involving a tractor , van and combine harvester .
a reminder that one lane remains closed through this evenings ' rush-hour , # a50 e/bound near # sudbury .
no delays yet .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: teenager injured in social club attack
text: a 17-year-old boy is recovering after being hit in the face near a social club in derby .
police said the teenager suffered swelling and a lump behind his ear when he was attacked by a group of young men in arleston lane , near sinfin moor social club .
the assault happened at about 18:30 on 22 september but details have only just been made public .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : goose fair in 1959
text: take a look at this amazing footage of how nottingham 's goose fair looked nearly 60 years ago .
the annual nottingham goose fair begins today .
take a look at the dizzying attractions in 1959 .
courtesy of @ twitterid # britainonfilm
this is part of my heritage .
now i make the trip nearly every october to go to goosie .
you 'll find me on the cake walk !
i 'm popping down on saturday .
has to be done !
absolutely !
i 'm a sucker for the traditional stuff like the cake walk and carousel .
i have n't been for a couple of years.just love the atmosphere walking round !
me too , the sights , the sounds and the smell .
it 's incredibly atmospheric .
i 'm sure i 'm there somewhere
where ; 's the mushy peas/cock on a stick ?
1959 seems a bit boring lol ; - ) # goosefair
fond memories .
a trip to goose fair was a big event !
the man standing up on the rotor was a bit startling .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicestershire drivers facing delays in several spots
text: a lane has also been reopened on the m1 northbound at junction 21 following a crash earlier but there are still delays in that area .
1 lane blocked on the # m1 n/b btwn j21 + j21a nr # leicester due to a collision .
@ twitterid are at scene , take care on approach
m69 northbound is really heavy towards the m1 and further up , traffic through j24 at kegworth is crawling too
traffic is struggling in the city from welford road round towards the hospital on aylestone road
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: council boss to step down
text: david slater has announced he will be stepping down as the leader of charnwood borough council next month .
mr slater has been at the helm for seven years but says the time is right to hand over to someone new .
he will formally resign as leader at the full council meeting on 6 november and members will vote on a replacement .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : storm clouds gather over bolsover castle
text: dramatic skies in this photo of bolsover castle , taken by viki the blue .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: weather : yellow warning for wind across east midlands
text: the met office has issued a yellow weather warning for wind after it emerged westerly winds of up to 60mph could be hitting the region tonight .
heavy rain will also be present in patches , and the warning is in place from 21:00 tonight until 09:00 tomorrow morning .
a spokesman for the met office said there could be disruption to transport and temporary power cuts as a result of the wind and rain .
a wet & windy night is in store across some northern and central parts of the uk , with heavy # rain and # gales sweeping south
a yellow severe weather warning has been issued for # wind with the potential for disruption to travel and power supplies # weatheraware
not again .
hardly needed it 's autumn it 's windy
this is just seasonal weather does it really warrant a weather warning
i think the met office are just trying 2 cover themselves , if not someone would complain about them not mentioning the strength of the wind
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: county ins & outs
text: county ins & outs

documents.title: blogger to face trial after anti-semitic song posted
text: a blogger accused of posting an anti-semitic song online denying the holocaust is to stand trial in january following a campaign by a jewish charity .
alison chabloz , from glossop , penned the song ( ( ( survivors ) ) ) , which describes notorious death camp auschwitz as `` a theme park '' .
she performed it , along with another called nemo 's anti-semitic universe , at a conference hosted by a group called the london forum in september last year .
district judge john zani listed her trial for january 10 next year , while a further preliminary hearing was listed for october 25 .
author: Press Association

documents.title: death road dangers flagged by coroner
text: death road dangers flagged by coroner

documents.title: miles of queues after broken down vehicle on m1
text: motorists on the m1 northbound are experiencing severe delays after a broken down vehicle blocked a lane .
highways england said there were four-and-a-half miles of queues as a result of the breakdown , which happened between junctions 24a and 25 .
# nottinghamshire on the # m1 n/bound , j24a - j25 , we 've just cleared a broken down car in the roadwk 's .
approx ' 4½ miles of queuing traffic
author: Highways England

documents.title: man pleads guilty to raping woman in lay-by
text: a man has pleaded guilty to raping a woman in a lay-by .
leicestershire police said wayne hobell , of no fixed address , up the 21-year-old victim in leicester city centre on 20 november last year before raping her in his car in a lay-by in oadby .
hobell admitted two counts of rape at leicester crown court on tuesday .
he will be sentenced on 23 november .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: read 's final season was 'phenomenal '
text: read 's final season was 'phenomenal '

documents.title: no silva signing ( yet ) for foxes as fifa rejects appeal
text: it 's been a tough start to the season for the foxes , and even though there are no league matches this coming weekend they 've received more bad news today .

world governing body fifa has rejected the club 's attempt to approve the signing sporting lisbon midfielder adrien silva , saying the paperwork for the portuguese player came in 14 seconds after the deadline on 31 august .
with craig shakespeare 's side struggling in 17th position , signing silva - earmarked as a replacement for danny drinkwater , who moved to reigning champions chelsea - would have been a boost .
leicester now must wait until january until they can add silva to their playing squad .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: oakham could get one-way system
text: plans to introduce a one-way system through oakham town centre have moved a step forward after a public consultation found most residents were in favour .
rutland county council wants to regenerate the area along high street to freshen up its look and attract more visitors .
the plans will be discussed next week and a final decision made in the new year .
if the revamp is approved , work could get under way before the end of the 2018 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thieves steal prince portrait from nottingham gallery
text: a portrait of music star prince is among four paintings stolen during a break-in at an art gallery in nottingham .
police said the mansfield road gallery was raided between 00:30 and 03:50 on thursday 14 september .
they 've asked anyone who 's been offered the paintings for sale to call them on 101 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chamber disappointed at lack of detail from pm
text: a stage interloper may have grabbed the headlines at the prime minister 's conference speech but the organisation that represents businesses in burton says it was more concerned at the lack of detail on how firms will be supported during brexit .

chris plant , director of the burton and district chambers of commerce , said in a written statement : the prime minister said much today about her party 's record in government , but less about what concrete , practical steps the government will take in the months ahead to support growth and investment .
`` businesses will be looking for clear commitments this autumn .
we need a mission statement for growth , with action to fix the fundamentals , and prepare the country for a period of change . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lane to stay closed on a50 after tractor crash
text: definitely worth allowing more time if you 're heading this way .
# a50 e/b within the # a515 junction for # sudbury will have 1 lane closed until this evening for on-going repairs .
please plan ahead .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'extinct ' spider found in country park
text: 'extinct ' spider found in country park

documents.title: 'thank heavens a50 tractor smash was n't worse '
text: we 've had nearly 300 comments on our facebook page about this morning 's a50 crash involving a van , tractor and combine harvester .
`` this looks like it could have been so much worse for the people involved .
thank heavens no one was fatally injured , '' posted helen ratcliffe .
stephen paul shantz posted : `` it 's harvest season , so there 's going to be farm equipment on the roads for a bit yet .
`` thankfully the accident was n't any worse and that it was just slow moving farm equipment and not a slow moving mini-bus of children . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: mps criticise boris johnson over libya comments
text: two conservative mps in nottinghamshire have added to the criticism of foreign secretary boris johnson , who caused uproar over his comments about libya .

broxtowe 's anna soubry has called for prime minister theresa may to sack him over the latest in a string of controversial incidents , while ruschliffe representative and father of the house ken clarke also said the remarks were beyond the pale .
i think boris has done himself enormous harm - he should go away and try and find something out about foreign policy and try to be foreign secretary .
author: BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: former rams star thrown out of disney park
text: former derby county forward giles barnes was one of three football players escorted out of disney 's epcot theme park in florida for being `` impaired and verbally aggressive '' in a pub .
a report from the orange county sheriff office said the 28-year-old , who plays for orlando city , was said to have `` cut in front of a guest '' in the pub and `` had a verbal argument '' .
barnes ( left ) was ordered to leave the park along with team-mate donald toia and usa striker alex morgan .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: campaigners to protest against assembly rooms replacement plan
text: campaigners are planning to protest outside derby city council 's headquarters this evening over its planned replacement for the assembly rooms .
members of the derby arts and theatre association are unhappy the authority 's proposed £ 32m venue has a much larger focus on rock concerts and comedy shows than theatrical performances .
the protest is due to be held before the council meets to discuss the plans .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather watchers : strutting your stuff or feeling sheepish ?
text: it 's an overcast and deceptively cold wednesday , but that has n't stopped one pheasant from doing what comes naturally to it down in east leake .
meanwhile it 's been all horseplay for malc 's view down in derbyshire , who snapped this long-faced pair in longford .
and over in burton overy ?
not to ram home the puns , but this is a b-ewe-tiful by junee .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: mansfield mp addresses conservative party conference
text: the conservative party needs to show voters how it can improve people 's lives , the first tory mp for mansfield has told the party conference .
ben bradley , who took the seat from labour for the first time in 94 years , said he was attracted to david cameron 's 'big society ' vision , and backed current leader theresa may 's ideas .
he admitted though that `` a lot of people were surprised '' at his election success - including , rather infamously , the election announcer who read out the wrong result .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: a50 partially reopens after tractor crash
text: the # a50 has re-opened e/b within the # a515 junction # sudbury 1 lane is closed for emergency repairs .
traffic is flowing well past the scene
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thieves smash open cash machine in countesthorpe
text: another cash machine has been attacked by thieves - this time in countesthorpe .
police said the machine , attached to the co-operative in main street , was smashed open at about 03:45 .
money was taken and boxes from inside the cash machine were found discarded on the outskirts of the village .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricketer denies sexual exposure charges
text: cricketer denies sexual exposure charges

documents.title: duncan : brexit vote was 'immigration tantrum '
text: sir alan duncan has said `` a bit of a tantrum '' over immigration was one of the reasons for british people voting to leave the eu .
the rutland mp and foreign office minister told an audience in the us the campaign had `` stirred up a lot of sentiment '' about migration among people who do n't usually vote .
duncan campaigned for remain during last year 's referendum .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: diamond spider sparkles 50 years after 'extinction '
text: it may be enough to put arachnophobes ' backs up , but two national trust volunteers in clumber park were delighted to come across a rare diamond spider .
they 've only been spotted three times in the south of england , the last of those coming in 1969 .
the distinctive diamond-shaped mark on its abdomen gave the game away , and now their discovery is all over the world wide web .
the spider ran away from me twice but with persistence and some luck i caught it ; at the time i had no idea that it would turn out to be such a rare find .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: derbyshire cricketer denies sexual exposure charges
text: derbyshire cricketer shiv thakor has pleaded not guilty to two counts of sexual exposure at southern derbyshire magistrates ' court .
the offences are alleged to have happened in june within a week of each other at a housing development off radbourne lane in mackworth .
he is due to go on trial at the same court on 15 november .
author: Ed Dawes
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: a50 still closed after tractor crash
text: the a50 eastbound remains closed near sudbury following a crash this morning involving a van , lorry and combine harvester .
highways england says the road is expected to stay closed until at least 13:30 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'drug mix-up ' death nurse struck off
text: 'drug mix-up ' death nurse struck off

documents.title: tennis player banned over cocaine test
text: british number four dan evans faces another six months on the sidelines after he was handed a ban for testing positive for cocaine earlier this year .

the 27-year-old , who has spent much of his career training at nottingham tennis centre , said the positive test in barcelona in april was because the drug had accidentally mixed with his medication in a washbag .
he was handed a one-year ban , which was back-dated to the day of his positive test , so he will be eligible to return to action from 24 april 2018 .
i am determined to return to the sport i love .
i want to thank everyone who has supported me throughout this difficult period .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: derbyshire man relives las vegas gun massacre
text: a derbyshire man caught up in the most deadly mass shooting in us history says he 's still trying to make sense of what happened .
david miller , from chesterfield , was among thousands of people enjoying a country music festival in las vegas when it was attacked by a lone gunman from a nearby hotel window .
the massacre left 58 people dead and another 500 injured .
mr miller , who escaped unharmed , told bbc radio derby : `` there was a rat-a-tat-tat , like jumping jacks on bonfire night .
a guy ran past us saying 'i 've just seen someone being shot - it 's real ' .
`` people around us started panicking , there were people falling over .
if you did n't keep up you got crushed - it was 22,000 people , many of them trying to get out of the same exit .
`` right now i 'm holding it together .
i 'm going to wait till i get back home before i throw an arm around myself and get counselling or whatever it is i need . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nottingham panthers make hockey history
text: it was a historic evening for the nottingham panthers last night as they became the first british side to make it through to the champions hockey league knockout stages .
they beat finnish side turku 2-0 at the nottingham arena thanks to goals from josh shalla and alex mokshantsev .
they can win group f if they win in turku on tuesday , or if swiss side bern fail to beat czech team mountfield .
it 's pretty special and has n't quite sunk in .
we played really , really well .
it means so much for us and for british ice hockey .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: car wash stabbing : five released after questioning
text: five men questioned by police following a stabbing in leicester have been released while investigations continue .
a 21-year-old man is in a stable condition after being found with stab wounds in adderley road on monday afternoon .
police believe he was attacked at a car wash in nearby welford road .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: peaty named in england 's commonwealth games squad
text: olympic champion adam peaty is among the first swimmers to be selected for team england 's gold coast commonwealth games squad .
the 2018 games - which take place from 4-15 april - will be the city of derby swimmer 's second commonwealths .
he won gold and silver medals at glasgow 2014 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: 'trump effect ' prompts university admissions boom in nottingham
text: a 25 % jump in the number of international students choosing nottingham business school has been attributed to donald trump 's hardline stance on immigration .

a recent study found a decline of almost two thirds in international students expressing interest in studying business in the us , but business schools in many countries outside the us have seen a rise in applications .
it 's thought concern over plans for tighter restrictions on visas offered to skilled foreign workers in the us could be behind the shift .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new hospital computer system does n't work properly
text: the trust in charge of nottingham 's hospitals has promised action after significant issues with a new computer system .

nearly £ 14m has been spent by nottingham university hospitals trust over the past two years on digitally scanning medical records in an attempt to go paperless - but clinicians have complained some patient data is missing .
hospital bosses said patients were n't at risk and they were working to design a system that better meets clinical need and improves patient care and safety .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: flower seller 'railroaded ' for tk maxx
text: flower seller 'railroaded ' for tk maxx

documents.title: nurse struck off after fatal overdose blunder
text: an agency nurse who accidentally gave a fatal drug overdose to a care home resident in leicestershire has been struck off .
patricia rosen , 78 , died at cedar court care home in wigston in february 2013 when she was given powerful painkillers meant for another patient by nurse mariana birsasteanu (

a nursing and midwifery council disciplinary panel said her actions `` caused or contributed to '' mrs rosen 's death and removing her name from the register was the only possible sanction for her misconduct .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: tractor on its side after a50 crash
text: this is the scene on the a50 eastbound near sudbury following this morning 's crash involving a van , tractor and an agricultural vehicle .
police said no-one has been seriously injured but the road is expected to stay closed for at least another hour .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

text: highways england is reporting the following road problems in the east midlands :

BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hi everyone .
liam barnes and i will be writing your news , sport , travel and weather updates today .
